name: sphygmomanometer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device for measuring blood pressure, consisting of a part that goes around the arm and fills with air, attached to a part that reads and shows the measurement: You hold out your arm, the sphygmomanometer cuff is wrapped around your biceps and the pressure in the brachial artery is taken. Systolic and diastolic blood pressures were measured with a mercury sphygmomanometer after a minimum of 10 minutes of rest in a sitting position. Synonym
blood pressure monitor
More examplesFewer examplesSitting blood pressures were measured manually with a sphygmomanometer.We can measure blood pressure using a sphygmomanometer or listen to someone's heart by using a stethoscope.Many wards have no routine maintenance policy for sphygmomanometers.
